text: Gua poroghamimning, God gua gamizɨ, gua mɨkarzir vamɨra ko, nɨghnɨzir vamɨra iti. God tizim bagha arazir kam gami? A kamaghsua, E boriba batɨtɨ, me guizbangɨra Godɨn adarazir ikiam. Egh ia bizir kam bagh deraghvɨra gan, ia uan amuir inigha itir kaba ko akar dɨkɨrɨzir gavgavir kaba, ia da abɨghan markɨ.2:15 Hibrun akam deragha akar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
